column4: hello everyone I have an Ubuntu HP Pavilion ze5700 laptop.  I took all of the screws out, but it still doesn't open!!  ggrrr!  Can someone help? :)))
but why? why open a laptop?
The power connector is loose and I was thinking about saudering it back to the mother board, or replacing the jack that holds the power connector to the mother board.
humm. you might need a spudger, if it has locking tabs or something.
Use the spudger to open the lap top if it has something like locking tabs?
yes. are there seams where two sections of platic meet? a spudger is a small platic screwdriver/wedge that's gentle on plastic.
Yes there is a plastic piece!  It's on the part of the laptop that is hard to open, so I bet that's it!  I tried using my mechanical pencil to open it up...I'll try something else lol
Ok I got a sharp compass and it's pulling a little out, so this is good!  I tried it from the side...or should I try to pull it out from the top?...I'll keep experimenting :)
no idea. :)  My ibook is all good, thanks to some online breakdown guide I found for it.  I even managed to replace the screen frame hinge. (Quite the feat, and PITA)
I think one of the engineering problems that HP, Apple, etc. face is... "how are we going to make this as difficult as possible for the consumer to take apart?" :)
lol. I think that's pretty much the design goal of anyone.
I have done the impossible!!
time to get some coffee :)
Now I'm onto another problem on the opposite side of the laptop, it seems to not want to budge, this is interesting!
double check for screws. even if they hide under a label.
well the edge is right next to the DVD player, so I'd guess I might have to take the DVD player out first.
ahhh. the ibook has three, yea THREE obnoxious plastic tab interlocks above the dvd drive. maybe hp stole that idea to.
What if you're trying to open up the laptop with the spudger..and you think there is tab there..and you feel that you're pulling so hard that plastic might break...what do you do? lol
*puts dynamite into the laptop and blows it up*
gimmie first! :-X
Well it's a friends, so if I gave it away they might get upset :( lol
but TNT is ok hum?
At least I have something to give back
a heap of parts ;)
